title: Fangless
description: My name is Kiler Matthews, I'm a vampire and a homicide detective, and my world has been turned upside down. It all starts with my partner Roland and I chasing a suspect in an alley and ends with finding a head but no body. As it turns out I know that head and it hits the fan from there. I'm a suspect in a series of murders and to top it off I went through Blood Call and now I have a life mate that I need to protect. Shay is a dancer at Club Cargo and club own and ran by vamp and caters to vamps but demons and humans alike go there. Shay takes my breath away but has a secret that he thinks will change how I feel about him. This is a sexually explicit book. Hot male/male sex and graphic language.
author: Valynda King
